channel.title: How do I add a kick and ban or banip on the side of a player, but only mod+canc
channel.description: Hello, well I get alot of massers and people that like to go invisible and stuff on my server, and everytime I want to ip ban them I have to goto the files and get there ip then put it in the banips, is there anyway I can just add a Kick-Ban-Ipban on the side of a player, I also want it to be mod+, but for ip ban admin+. Thanks!

item.title: How do I add a kick and ban or banip on the side of a player, but only mod+canc
item.dc:creator: @PLAYTIME PLAYTIME
item.description:
@PLAYTIME wrote:

ChemicalReaction™:

Please explain what you mean by ’ side of player ’

I mean like right click them, and then only admins and mods can see, ban user or kick, and admins can only see ban ip.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add a kick and ban or banip on the side of a player, but only mod+canc

item.title: How do I add a kick and ban or banip on the side of a player, but only mod+canc
item.dc:creator: @hallowed_soul hallowed soul
item.description:
@hallowed_soul wrote:

for a temp. fix usually ::kick (user) or ::banuser (user) work and you could make an ip command only you could use.

Read full topic
